author: Deccan
title: Shamlee joins Twitter!
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 05, 2015, 06.23 am Shamlee Actress Shamlee who was once popular as a child artiste is back to silver screen with two films in Kollywood — one each alongside Dhanush and Vikram Prabhu. While the untitled film with Dhanush to be directed by Durai Senthilkumar will go on floors later, the younger sister of actress Shalini is currently shooting for Veera Sivaji opposite Vikram Prabhu at Puducherry. The actress recently came up with an impressive photo shoot clicked by her brother-in-law actor Ajith hinting her re-entry into the tinsel town in a full-fledged manner. The pretty lass has now joined Twitter with the handle ‘@ShamleeOfficial’ to stay connected with her fans and well wishers and has around 1,000 followers. Meanwhile, there are rumours that the actress is expected to do a film in Tollywood too. It has to be noted that Shamlee paired opposite Siddharth in the 2009 Telugu romantic tale Oye. entertainment Kollywood twitter Shamlee Durai Senthilkumar Also Read Movie review 'The Walk': A thrilling balancing act A penchant for penning lyrics Celebrities pay tributes to APJ Abdul Kalam I ate 100 paans in a day: Aamir Khan
